garden_planning.title: Garden Planning
garden_planning.description: Plan your garden using our intuitive design tools. Choose from a variety of plants to create a beautiful garden space.

why.title: Why Permaculture
why.description: The growth of edible crops is vital for creating a diverse and functioning ecosystem, while also providing outdoor living spaces for both animals and humans.

community.title: Community
community.description: Connect with other permaculture gardeners, share your successes and challenges, and get inspired by the beautiful gardens of others.
